home.title: WoWSims - The Burning Crusade
home.description: A powerful simulation tool for World of Warcraft: The Burning Crusade
home.welcomeDescription: Welcome to WoWSims - The Burning Crusade! This is a community-driven project to provide class and raid simulations for World of Warcraft® The Burning Crusade Classic together with the leading theorycrafters and class representatives.

list_picker.action_has_warnings: This action has warnings, and might not behave as expected.
list_picker.action_has_errors: This action has errors, and will not behave as expected.

preset.description: This preset affects the following settings:

sim.title: The Burning Crusade {{spec}} {{class}} simulator
sim.description: {{spec}} {{class}} simulations for World of Warcraft® The Burning Crusade Classic.
sim.basic_bis_disclaimer:
Preset gear lists are intended as rough approximations of BIS, and will often not be the absolute highest-DPS setup for you. Your optimal gear setup will depend on many factors; that's why we have a sim!

Items may also be omitted from the presets if they are highly contested and clearly better utilized on other classes, to encourage equitable gearing for the raid as a whole.
sim.healing_sim_disclaimer:
*** WARNING - USE AT YOUR OWN RISK ***

The entire concept of a healing sim is EXPERIMENTAL. All results should be taken with an EXTREMELY large grain of salt.

This tool is currently more similar to a spreadsheet than a true sim. Options for specifying incoming damage profiles in order to have proper reactive rotations have not yet been added.

notice_local_download.title: Did you know?
notice_local_download.message: You can download our local sim to speed up your simulations significantly?

crash_modal.title: Extra Crash Information
crash_modal.header: Please append the following complete link to the issue you just created. This will simplify debugging the issue.

unlaunched.title: This sim is currently not supported.
unlaunched.discord_message: Make sure to join our Discord!

notifications.simulation_failed: The Simulation failed. Generated an error report.
notifications.failed_to_file_report: Failed to file report... try again another time:

crash_report.confirm_message: Press Ok to file crash report

missing_gear_message.title: If gear is missing, check the selected phase and your gear filters.
missing_gear_message.description: If the problem persists, save any un-saved data, click the gear icon to open your sim options, then click the "Restore Defaults".

cooldowns.title: Cooldowns
cooldowns.tooltip:
Specify cooldown timings, in seconds. Cooldowns will be used as soon as possible after their specified timings. When not specified, cooldowns will be used when ready and it is sensible to do so.

Multiple timings can be provided by separating with commas. Any cooldown usages after the last provided timing will use the default logic.

gear_picker.ep_tooltip: EP (Equivalence Points) is way of comparing items by multiplying the raw stats of an item with your current stat weights. More EP does not necessarily mean more DPS, as EP doesn't take into account stat caps and non-linear stat calculations.

preset_configurations.title: Preset Configurations
preset_configurations.tooltip: Preset configurations can apply an optimal combination of gear, talents, rotation and encounter settings.

raid_buffs.title: Raid Buffs
raid_buffs.description: All raid buffs/debuffs selected are assumed to be provided by other raid members than the simulated player.

external_damage_cooldowns.title: External Damage Cooldowns
external_damage_cooldowns.tooltip: Major damage cooldowns provided by other party/raid members.

external_defensive_cooldowns.title: External Defensive Cooldowns
external_defensive_cooldowns.tooltip: Major defensive cooldowns provided by other party/raid members.

input_delay.label: Input Delay
input_delay.tooltip: Player input delay, in milliseconds. Specifies the maximum delay on actions that cannot be spell queued, such as spell casts that are waiting on resource gains or waiting for a cooldown to expire. Also used with certain APL values (such as 'Aura Is Active With Reaction Time'). Roughly models the sum of reaction time + server latency.

channel_clip_delay.label: Channel Clip Delay
channel_clip_delay.tooltip: Clip delay following channeled spells, in milliseconds. This delay occurs following any full or partial channel ending after the GCD becomes available, due to the player not being able to queue the next spell.

in_front_of_target.label: In Front of Target
in_front_of_target.tooltip: Stand in front of the target, causing Blocks and Parries to be included in the attack table.

distance_from_target.label: Distance From Target
distance_from_target.tooltip: Distance from targets, in yards. Used to calculate travel time for certain spells.

tank_assignment.label: Tank Assignment
tank_assignment.tooltip: Determines which mobs will be tanked. Most mobs default to targeting the Main Tank, but in preset multi-target encounters this is not always true.

incoming_hps.label: Incoming HPS
incoming_hps.tooltip: Average amount of healing received per second. Used for calculating chance of death. If set to 0, defaults to 25% of the primary target's base DPS.

healing_cadence.label: Healing Cadence
healing_cadence.tooltip: How often the incoming heal 'ticks', in seconds. Generally, longer durations favor Effective Hit Points (EHP) for minimizing Chance of Death, while shorter durations favor avoidance. Example: if Incoming HPS is set to 1000 and this is set to 1s, then every 1s a heal will be received for 1000. If this is instead set to 2s, then every 2s a heal will be recieved for 2000. If set to 0, default values for Healing Cadence and Cadence +/- are inferred from boss damage parameters.

healing_cadence_variation.label: Cadence +/-
healing_cadence_variation.tooltip: Magnitude of random variation in healing intervals, in seconds. Example: if Healing Cadence is set to 1s with 0.5s variation, then the interval between successive heals will vary uniformly between 0.5 and 1.5s. If the variation is instead set to 2s, then 50% of healing intervals will fall between 0s and 1s, and the other 50% will fall between 1s and 3s. The amount of healing per 'tick' is automatically scaled up or down based on the randomized time since the last tick, so as to keep HPS constant.

absorb_frac.label: Absorb %
absorb_frac.tooltip: % of each incoming heal 'tick' to model as an absorb shield rather than as a direct heal.

burst_window.label: TMI Burst Window
burst_window.tooltip: Size in whole seconds of the burst window for calculating TMI. It is important to use a consistent setting when comparing this metric. Default is 6 seconds. If set to 0, TMI calculations are disabled.

hp_percent_for_defensives.label: HP % for Defensive CDs
hp_percent_for_defensives.tooltip: % of Maximum Health, below which defensive cooldowns are allowed to be used. If set to 0, this restriction is disabled.

pet_uptime.label: Pet Uptime (%)
pet_uptime.tooltip: Percent of the fight duration for which your pet will be alive.

glaive_toss_chance.label: Glaive Toss Success %
glaive_toss_chance.tooltip: The chance that Glaive Toss hits secondary targets in percentages.

detonate_seed.label: Detonate Seed on Cast
detonate_seed.tooltip: Simulates raid doing damage to targets such that seed detonates immediately on cast.

stance_snapshot.label: Stance Snapshot
stance_snapshot.tooltip: Ability that is cast at the same time as stance swap will benefit from the bonus of the stance before the swap.

assume_bleed_active.label: Assume Bleed Always Active
assume_bleed_active.tooltip: Assume bleed always exists for 'Rend and Tear' calculations. Otherwise will only calculate based on own rip/rake/lacerate.

cannot_shred_target.label: Cannot Shred Target
cannot_shred_target.tooltip: Alternative to "In Front of Target" for modeling bosses that do not Parry or Block, but which you still cannot Shred.

okf_uptime.label: Owlkin Frenzy Uptime (%)
okf_uptime.tooltip: Percentage of fight uptime for Owlkin Frenzy

sync_type.label: Sync/Stagger Setting
sync_type.tooltip: Choose your sync or stagger option. Auto: Will auto pick sync options based on your weapons attack speeds. None: No Sync or Staggering, used for mismatched weapon speeds. Perfect Sync: Makes your weapons always attack at the same time, for match weapon speeds. Delayed Offhand: Adds a slight delay to the offhand attacks while staying within the 0.5s flurry ICD window.

show_matching_gems.label: Match Socket
show_matching_gems.tooltip: Show only items with matching socket colors

phase_selector.label: Phase
phase_selector.tooltip: Select the game phase for item availability

enable_item_swap.label: Enable Item Swapping
enable_item_swap.tooltip: Allows configuring an Item Swap Set which is used with the Item Swap APL action.

assume_prepull_mastery_elixir.label: Assume Prepull Mastery Elixir
assume_prepull_mastery_elixir.tooltip: Enabling this assumes you are using a Mastery Elixir during prepull.

blessings.title: Blessings
blessings.tooltip: Specify Paladin Blessings for each role, in order of priority. Blessings in the 1st column will be used if there is at least 1 Paladin in the raid, 2nd column if at least 2, etc.

shaman_disable_immolate.label: Disable Immolate during Unleash WF
shaman_disable_immolate.tooltip: When talented into Primal Elementalist and with Immolate autocast on, this will disallow casting Immolate when the Unleash Wind buff is active on the player.

shaman_disable_immolate_duration.label: Extend disable by
shaman_disable_immolate_duration.tooltip: Time in seconds for which Immolate won't be cast after the end of the Unleash Wind buff on the player. Set 0 for disabling casting Immolate only while the buff is up.

frenzy_time.label: Frenzy time
frenzy_time.tooltip: Simulation time (in seconds) at which to disable tank swaps and enable the boss Frenzy buff

spiritual_grasp_frequency.label: Spiritual Grasp frequency
spiritual_grasp_frequency.tooltip: Average time (in seconds) between Spiritual Grasp hits, following an exponential distribution

jalak_death_time.label: Jalak death time
jalak_death_time.tooltip: Simulation time (in seconds) at which to disable War-God Jalak and trigger the Rampage buff on Horridon. If set longer than the simulated fight length, then Jalak will be tanked the entire time and Rampage will never be triggered.

taunt_swap_for_triple_puncture.label: Taunt swap for Triple Puncture
taunt_swap_for_triple_puncture.tooltip: If checked, taunt swap upon Jalak's death and on every other Triple Puncture application afterwards in order to limit stack accumulation on a single tank.

movement_interval.label: Movement Interval
movement_interval.tooltip: How often the player will move in seconds

reaction_time.label: Reaction Time
reaction_time.tooltip: How long the player can wait for casts to finish before moving in seconds

yards.label: Yards
yards.tooltip: How many yards the player moves

adds_respawn_time.label: Add(s) respawn time
adds_respawn_time.tooltip: Time for add(s) to respawn after previous died (in seconds)

adds_lifetime.label: Add(s) lifetime
adds_lifetime.tooltip: How long the add(s) stay alive (in seconds)

adds_spawn_delay.label: Add(s) spawn delay
adds_spawn_delay.tooltip: Initial delay before the add(s) spawn (in seconds)

duration.label: Duration
duration.tooltip: The fight length for each sim iteration, in seconds.

duration_variation.label: Duration +/-
duration_variation.tooltip: Adds a random amount of time, in seconds, between [value, -1 * value] to each sim iteration. For example, setting Duration to 180 and Duration +/- to 10 will result in random durations between 170s and 190s.

execute_duration_20.label: Execute Duration 20 (%)
execute_duration_20.tooltip: Percentage of the total encounter duration, for which the targets will be considered to be in execute range (< 20% HP) for the purpose of effects like Warrior Execute or Mage Molten Fury.

execute_duration_25.label: Execute Duration 25 (%)
execute_duration_25.tooltip: Percentage of the total encounter duration, for which the targets will be considered to be in execute range (< 25% HP) for the purpose of effects like Warlock's Drain Soul.

execute_duration_35.label: Execute Duration 35 (%)
execute_duration_35.tooltip: Percentage of the total encounter duration, for which the targets will be considered to be in execute range (< 35% HP) for the purpose of effects like Death Knight Soul Reaper.

execute_duration_45.label: Execute Duration 45 (%)
execute_duration_45.tooltip: Percentage of the total encounter duration, for which the targets will be considered to be in execute range (< 45% HP) for the purpose of effects like Death Knight Soul Reaper with T15 DPS 4pc.

duration_below_high_hp.label: Duration spent below high-HP regime (%)
duration_below_high_hp.tooltip: Percentage of the total encounter duration, for which the targets are considered out of range for effects like Hunter Careful Aim (<90% HP) or Druid Predatory Strikes (<80% HP).

use_health.label: Use Health
use_health.tooltip: Uses a damage limit in place of a duration limit. Damage limit is equal to sum of all targets health.

num_allies.label: Num Allies
num_allies.tooltip: Number of allied players in the raid.

min_base_damage.label: Min Base Damage
min_base_damage.tooltip: Base damage for auto attacks, i.e. lowest roll with 0 AP against a 0-armor Player.

ai.label: AI
ai.tooltip: Determines the target's ability rotation. Note that most rotations are not yet implemented.

tanked_by.label: Tanked By
tanked_by.tooltip: Determines which player in the raid this enemy will attack. If no player is assigned to the specified tank slot, this enemy will not attack.

swing_speed.label: Swing Speed
swing_speed.tooltip: Time in seconds between auto attacks. Set to 0 to disable auto attacks.

dual_wield_penalty.label: Dual Wield Penalty
dual_wield_penalty.tooltip: Enables the Dual Wield Miss Penalty (+19% chance to miss) if dual wielding. Bosses in Hyjal/BT/SWP usually have this disabled to stop tanks from avoidance stacking.

parry_haste.label: Parry Haste
parry_haste.tooltip: Whether this enemy will gain parry haste when parrying attacks.

spell_school.label: Spell School
spell_school.tooltip: Type of damage caused by auto attacks. This is usually Physical, but some enemies have elemental attacks.

damage_spread.label: Damage Spread
damage_spread.tooltip: Fractional spread between the minimum and maximum auto-attack damage from this enemy at 0 Attack Power.

alerts.choose_name: Choose a label for your saved talents!

bulk_tab.title: Batch (New)
bulk_tab.description:
Batch Simming is a new feature akin to the Top Gear sim on Raidbots.com that allows you to select multiple items and sim them find the best combinations.
This is an Alpha feature, so if you have feedback or find a bug, please report it!
bulk_tab.download_local: Download the local sim for faster results.

inherit_upgrades.label: Inherit Upgrades
inherit_upgrades.tooltip: When enabled, items will inherit upgrades from the equipped item. Otherwise, items will be simmed without any upgrades.

freeze_ring.label: Freeze ring slot
freeze_ring.tooltip: Freeze one equipped ring to reduce combination counts

freeze_trinket.label: Freeze trinket slot
freeze_trinket.tooltip: Freeze one equipped trinket to reduce combination counts

notifications.failed_to_remove_item: Failed to remove item, please report this issue.

warning.iterations_limit: Simming over {{limit}} iterations in the web sim will take a long time or may not run at all. For larger batch sims we recommend using Fast Mode or downloading the executable and running on your machine.

picker.remove_tooltip: Remove this item from the batch.
picker.failed_update: Failed to update item, please report this issue.
picker.failed_remove: Failed to remove item, please report this issue.

results.run_simulation: Run a simulation to view results

import_modal.title: Bag Item Import
import_modal.description_line1: Import bag items from a JSON file, which can be created by the WowSimsExporter in-game AddOn.
import_modal.description_line2: To import, upload the file or paste the text below, then click, 'Import'.

tooltips.actions: Actions in this group. These will be executed in order when the group is referenced.
tooltips.name: Name of this action group (e.g., 'careful_aim', 'cooldowns').
tooltips.overview: Groups of actions that can be referenced in the Action Priority List (APL). Useful for organizing your APL and reusing common action sequences. Actions are performed in order from top to bottom within a group.
Actions executed before the fight starts, such as pre-pull buffs or potions.

A list of actions representing your character's actions during the fight. The sim will evaluate the list from top (highest priority) to bottom (lowest priority) and choose the first valid action to take at any given time.

attributes.name: Name
attributes.valueTooltip: The value expression that this variable represents.

tooltips.name: Name of the variable (e.g., 'my_dot_remains', 'boss_health_pct')
tooltips.overview: Variables can be used to store complex conditions that can be referenced in the Action Priority List (APL). This is useful for storing dynamic values that change during the fight, such as cooldown timers or resource levels.
tooltips.value: The value expression that this variable represents.

prepull_actions.title: Prepull Actions
prepull_actions.tooltip: Actions to perform before the pull.

do_at.label: Do At
do_at.tooltip: Time before pull to do the action. Should be negative, and formatted like, '-1s' or '-2500ms'.

priority_list.title: Priority List
priority_list.tooltip: At each decision point, the simulation will perform the first valid action from this list.

cast.label: Cast
cast.tooltip: Casts the spell if possible, i.e. resource/cooldown/GCD/etc requirements are all met.

cast_at_player.label: Cast at Player
cast_at_player.tooltip: Casts a friendly spell if possible, i.e. resource/cooldown/GCD/etc requirements are all met.

multi_dot.label: Multi Dot
multi_dot.tooltip: Keeps a DoT active on multiple targets by casting the specified spell.

max_dots.label: Max Dots
max_dots.tooltip: Maximum number of DoTs to simultaneously apply.

overlap.label: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Maximum amount of time before a DoT expires when it may be refreshed.

strict_multi_dot.label: Strict Multi Dot
strict_multi_dot.tooltip: Keeps a DoT active on multiple targets by casting the specified spell. Will not refresh DoTs that are not about to expire.

max_dots.label: Max Dots
max_dots.tooltip: Maximum number of DoTs to simultaneously apply.

overlap.label: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Maximum amount of time before a DoT expires when it may be refreshed.

multi_shield.label: Multi Shield
multi_shield.tooltip: Keeps a shield active on multiple targets by casting the specified spell.

max_shields.label: Max Shields
max_shields.tooltip: Maximum number of shields to simultaneously apply.

overlap.label: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Maximum amount of time before a shield expires when it may be refreshed.

channel.label: Channel
channel.full_description:
The difference between channeling a spell vs casting the spell is that channels can be interrupted. If the Interrupt If parameter is empty, this action is equivalent to Cast.

The channel will be interrupted only if all of the following are true:

  • Immediately following a tick of the channel
  • The Interrupt If condition evaluates to True
  • Another action in the APL list is available

Note that if you simply want to allow other actions to interrupt the channel, set Interrupt If to True.

interrupt_if.label: Interrupt If
interrupt_if.tooltip: Interrupt the channel if the condition is true.

recast.label: Recast
recast.tooltip: If checked, interrupts of this channel will recast the spell.

cast_all_stat_buff_cooldowns.label: Cast All Stat Buff Cooldowns
cast_all_stat_buff_cooldowns.tooltip: Casts all available stat buff cooldowns.
cast_all_stat_buff_cooldowns.full_description:
• Does not cast cooldowns which are already controlled by other actions in the priority list.
  • By default, this action will cast such cooldowns greedily as they become available. However, when embedded in a sequence, the action will only fire when ALL cooldowns matching the specified buff type(s) are ready.

autocast_other_cooldowns.label: Autocast Other Cooldowns
autocast_other_cooldowns.tooltip: Automatically casts other cooldowns when available.
autocast_other_cooldowns.full_description:
• Does not auto-cast cooldowns which are already controlled by other actions in the priority list.
  • Cooldowns are usually cast immediately upon becoming ready, but there are some basic smart checks in place, e.g. don't use Mana CDs when near full mana.

wait.label: Wait
wait.tooltip: Waits for the specified amount of time.

wait_until.label: Wait Until
wait_until.tooltip: Waits until the specified condition is true.

scheduled_action.label: Scheduled Action
scheduled_action.tooltip: Performs an action at a scheduled time.

do_at.label: Do At
do_at.tooltip: Comma-separated list of timings. The inner action will be performed once at each timing.

do_at.label: Do At
do_at.tooltip: Performs an action at a specific time.

sequence.label: Sequence
sequence.tooltip: A list of sub-actions to execute in the specified order.
sequence.full_description:
Once one of the sub-actions has been performed, the next sub-action will not necessarily be immediately executed next. The system will restart at the beginning of the whole actions list (not the sequence). If the sequence is executed again, it will perform the next sub-action.

When all actions have been performed, the sequence does NOT automatically reset; instead, it will be skipped from now on. Use the Reset Sequence action to reset it, if desired.

reset_sequence.label: Reset Sequence
reset_sequence.tooltip: Restarts a sequence, so that the next time it executes it will perform its first sub-action.
reset_sequence.full_description: Use the name field to refer to the sequence to be reset. The desired sequence must have the same (non-empty) value for its name.

strict_sequence.label: Strict Sequence
strict_sequence.tooltip: Like a regular Sequence, except all sub-actions are executed immediately after each other and the sequence resets automatically upon completion.
strict_sequence.full_description: Strict Sequences do not begin unless ALL sub-actions are ready.

change_target.label: Change Target
change_target.tooltip: Sets the current target, which is the target of auto attacks and most casts by default.

activate_aura_with_stacks.label: Activate Aura With Stacks
activate_aura_with_stacks.tooltip: Activates the specified aura with the given number of stacks.
activate_aura_with_stacks.stacks_tooltip: Desired number of initial aura stacks.

activate_all_stat_buff_proc_auras.label: Activate All Stat Buff Proc Auras
activate_all_stat_buff_proc_auras.tooltip: Activates all item/enchant proc auras that buff the specified stat type(s) using the specified item set.

item_swap.label: Item Swap
item_swap.tooltip: Swaps items, using the swap set specified in Settings.

move.label: Move
move.tooltip: Starts a move to the desired range from target.
move.duration_tooltip: Amount of time the character should move.
move.move_duration_tooltip: The characters moves for the given duration.

optimal_rotation_action.label: Optimal Rotation Action
optimal_rotation_action.tooltip: Executes optimized Feral DPS rotation using hardcoded algorithm.

wrath_weave.label: Enable Wrath-weaving
wrath_weave.tooltip: Cast Wrath when possible during the Heart of the Wild DPS window. Ignored if HotW is not talented.

guardian_hotw_dps_rotation.label: HotW DPS Rotation
guardian_hotw_dps_rotation.tooltip: Executes optimized HotW DPS rotation using hardcoded algorithm.

warlock_next_exhale_target.label: Target Next Exhale Target
warlock_next_exhale_target.tooltip: Targets the next valid exhale target. If the current target is not the inhale target or no inhale has been cast, the target will not change.

compare.label: Compare
compare.tooltip: Compare two values using the specified operator

math.label: Math
math.tooltip: Perform mathematical operations on two values

max.label: Max
max.tooltip: Get the maximum value from a list of values

min.label: Min
min.tooltip: Get the minimum value from a list of values

all_of.label: All Of
all_of.tooltip: True if ALL of the values are true

any_of.label: Any Of
any_of.tooltip: True if ANY of the values are true

not.label: Not
not.tooltip: True if the value is false

current_time_percent.label: Current Time %
current_time_percent.tooltip: Current time as a percentage of the encounter duration

remaining_time_percent.label: Remaining Time %
remaining_time_percent.tooltip: Remaining time as a percentage of the encounter duration

is_execute_phase.label: Is Execute Phase
is_execute_phase.tooltip: True if we are in the execute phase (target health below threshold)

num_targets.label: Number of Targets
num_targets.tooltip: Number of targets in the encounter

spell_is_casting.label: Spell Is Casting
spell_is_casting.tooltip: True if the spell is currently being cast

spell_time_to_ready.label: Spell Time to Ready
spell_time_to_ready.tooltip: Time until the spell will be ready

in_front_of_target.label: In Front of Target
in_front_of_target.tooltip: True if we are in front of the target

boss_cast.label: Boss Cast
boss_cast.tooltip: True if the boss is casting the specified spell

boss_cast_time_to_ready.label: Boss Cast Time to Ready
boss_cast_time_to_ready.tooltip: Time until the boss spell will be ready

boss_current_target.label: Is Tanking
boss_current_target.tooltip: True if the player is currently tanking

unit_is_moving.label: Unit Is Moving
unit_is_moving.tooltip: True if the unit is moving

current_health_percent.label: Current Health %
current_health_percent.tooltip: Current health as a percentage of max health

current_mana_percent.label: Current Mana (%)
current_mana_percent.tooltip: Amount of currently available Mana, as a percentage.

estimated_time_to_target_focus.label: Estimated Time To Target Focus
estimated_time_to_target_focus.tooltip: Estimated time until target Focus is reached, will return 0 if at or above target.

estimated_time_to_target_energy.label: Estimated Time To Target Energy
estimated_time_to_target_energy.tooltip: Estimated time until target Energy is reached, will return 0 if at or above target.

current_combo_points.label: Current Combo Points
current_combo_points.tooltip: Amount of currently available Combo Points.

max_combo_points.label: Max Combo Points
max_combo_points.tooltip: Amount of maximum available Combo Points.

solar_energy.label: Solar Energy
solar_energy.tooltip: Amount of currently available Solar Energy.

lunar_energy.label: Lunar Energy
lunar_energy.tooltip: Amount of currently available Lunar Energy

current_eclipse_phase.label: Current Eclipse Phase
current_eclipse_phase.tooltip: The eclipse phase the druid currently is in.

gcd_is_ready.label: GCD Is Ready
gcd_is_ready.tooltip: True if the GCD is not on cooldown, otherwise False.

gcd_time_to_ready.label: GCD Time To Ready
gcd_time_to_ready.tooltip: Amount of time remaining before the GCD comes off cooldown, or 0 if it is not on cooldown.

time_to_next_auto.label: Time To Next Auto
time_to_next_auto.tooltip: Amount of time remaining before the next Main-hand or Off-hand melee attack, or 0 if autoattacks are not engaged.

spell_known.label: Spell Known
spell_known.tooltip: True if the spell is currently known, otherwise False.

current_cost.label: Current Cost
current_cost.tooltip: Returns current resource cost of spell

can_cast.label: Can Cast
can_cast.tooltip: True if all requirements for casting the spell are currently met, otherwise False.
can_cast.full_description: The Cast Spell action does not need to be conditioned on this, because it applies this check automatically.

is_ready.label: Is Ready
is_ready.tooltip: True if the spell is not on cooldown, otherwise False.

time_to_ready.label: Time To Ready
time_to_ready.tooltip: Amount of time remaining before the spell comes off cooldown, or 0 if it is not on cooldown.

cast_time.label: Cast Time
cast_time.tooltip: Amount of time to cast the spell including any haste and spell cast time adjustments.

travel_time.label: Travel Time
travel_time.tooltip: Amount of time for the spell to travel to the target.

cpm.label: CPM
cpm.tooltip: Casts Per Minute for the spell so far in the current iteration.

is_channeling.label: Is Channeling
is_channeling.tooltip: True if this spell is currently being channeled, otherwise False.

channeled_ticks.label: Channeled Ticks
channeled_ticks.tooltip: The number of completed ticks in the current channel of this spell, or 0 if the spell is not being channeled.

number_of_charges.label: Number of Charges
number_of_charges.tooltip: The number of charges that are currently available for the spell.

time_to_next_charge.label: Time to next Charge
time_to_next_charge.tooltip: The time until the next charge is available. 0 if spell has all charges avaialable.

gcd_hasted_duration.label: GCD Hasted Duration
gcd_hasted_duration.tooltip: The duration of the GCD induced by a cast with the current haste

full_cooldown.label: Full Cooldown
full_cooldown.tooltip: The full cooldown duration of the spell

channel_clip_delay.label: Channel Clip Delay
channel_clip_delay.tooltip: The amount of time specified by the Channel Clip Delay setting.

input_delay.label: Input Delay
input_delay.tooltip: The amount of time specified by the Input Dleay setting.

spell_in_flight.label: Spell in Flight
spell_in_flight.tooltip: True if this spell is currently in flight, otherwise False.

aura_known.label: Aura Known
aura_known.tooltip: True if the aura is currently known, otherwise False.

aura_active.label: Aura Active
aura_active.tooltip: True if the aura is currently active AND it has been active for at least as long as the player reaction time (configured in Settings), otherwise False.

aura_active_with_reaction_time.label: [DEPRECATED] Aura Active (with Reaction Time)
aura_active_with_reaction_time.tooltip: All Aura checks now contain Reaction Time logic, so this is no longer needed. Use instead.

aura_inactive.label: Aura Inactive
aura_inactive.tooltip: True if the aura is not currently active AND it has been inactive for at least as long as the player reaction time (configured in Settings), otherwise False.

aura_inactive_with_reaction_time.label: [DEPRECATED] Aura Inactive (with Reaction Time)
aura_inactive_with_reaction_time.tooltip: All Aura checks now contain Reaction Time logic, so this is no longer needed. Use instead.

aura_remaining_time.label: Aura Remaining Time
aura_remaining_time.tooltip: Time remaining before this aura will expire, or 0 if the aura is not currently active.

aura_num_stacks.label: Aura Num Stacks
aura_num_stacks.tooltip: Number of stacks of the aura.

aura_should_refresh.label: Aura Should Refresh
aura_should_refresh.tooltip: Whether this aura should be refreshed, e.g. for the purpose of maintaining a debuff.
aura_should_refresh.full_description:
This condition checks not only the specified aura but also any other auras on the same unit, including auras applied by other raid members, which apply the same debuff category.

For example, 'Should Refresh Debuff(Sunder Armor)' will return False if the unit has an active Expose Armor aura.

all_trinket_stat_procs_active.label: All Item Proc Buffs Active
all_trinket_stat_procs_active.tooltip: True if all item/enchant procs that buff the specified stat type(s) are currently active, otherwise False.
all_trinket_stat_procs_active.full_description: For stacking proc buffs, this condition also checks that the buff has been stacked to its maximum possible strength.

any_trinket_stat_procs_active.label: Any Item Proc Buff Active
any_trinket_stat_procs_active.tooltip: True if any item/enchant procs that buff the specified stat type(s) are currently active, otherwise False.
any_trinket_stat_procs_active.full_description: For stacking proc buffs, this condition also checks that the buff has been stacked to its maximum possible strength.

any_trinket_stat_procs_available.label: Any Item Proc Buff Available
any_trinket_stat_procs_available.tooltip: True if any item/enchant procs that buff the specified stat type(s) are currently not on ICD and aren't active, otherwise False.

trinket_procs_min_remaining_time.label: Item Procs Min Remaining Time
trinket_procs_min_remaining_time.tooltip: Shortest remaining duration on any active item/enchant procs that buff the specified stat type(s), or infinity if none are currently active.

trinket_procs_max_remaining_icd.label: Item Procs Max Remaining ICD
trinket_procs_max_remaining_icd.tooltip: Longest remaining ICD on any inactive item/enchant procs that buff the specified stat type(s), or 0 if all are currently active.

num_equipped_stat_proc_trinkets.label: Num Equipped Stat Proc Effects
num_equipped_stat_proc_trinkets.tooltip: Number of equipped passive item/enchant effects that buff the specified stat type(s) when they proc.

num_stat_buff_cooldowns.label: Num Stat Buff Cooldowns
num_stat_buff_cooldowns.tooltip: Number of registered Major Cooldowns that buff the specified stat type(s) when they are cast.
num_stat_buff_cooldowns.full_description: Both manually casted cooldowns as well as cooldowns controlled by "Cast All Stat Buff Cooldowns" and "Autocast Other Cooldowns" actions are included in the total count returned by this value.

any_stat_buff_cooldowns_active.label: Any Stat Buff Cooldowns Active
any_stat_buff_cooldowns_active.tooltip: True if any registered Major Cooldowns that buff the specified stat type(s) are currently active, otherwise False.
any_stat_buff_cooldowns_active.full_description:
For stacking buffs, this condition also checks that the buff has been stacked to its maximum possible strength after the cooldown is activated.

Both manually casted cooldowns as well as cooldowns controlled by "Cast All Stat Buff Cooldowns" and "Autocast Other Cooldowns" actions are checked.

any_stat_buff_cooldowns_min_duration.label: Any Stat Buff Cooldowns Min Remaining Time
any_stat_buff_cooldowns_min_duration.tooltip: Shortest remaining duration on any registered Major Cooldown that buff the specified stat type(s), or infinity if none are currently active.

dot_is_active.label: Dot Is Active
dot_is_active.tooltip: True if the specified dot is currently ticking, otherwise False.

dot_is_active_on_all_targets.label: Dot Is Active On All Targets
dot_is_active_on_all_targets.tooltip: True if the specified dot is currently ticking on all targets, otherwise False.

dot_remaining_time.label: Dot Remaining Time
dot_remaining_time.tooltip: Time remaining before the last tick of this DoT will occur, or 0 if the DoT is not currently ticking.

dot_lowest_remaining_time.label: Dot Lowest Remaining Time
dot_lowest_remaining_time.tooltip: Time remaining before the last tick of this DoT on any target will occur, or 0 if the DoT is not currently ticking.

dot_time_to_next_tick.label: Dot Time To Next Tick
dot_time_to_next_tick.tooltip: The time remaining until the next tick of this DoT will occur.

dot_percent_increase.label: Dot Damage Increase %
dot_percent_increase.tooltip: How much stronger a new DoT would be compared to the old.

sequence_is_complete.label: Sequence Is Complete
sequence_is_complete.tooltip: True if there are no more subactions left to execute in the sequence, otherwise False.

sequence_is_ready.label: Sequence Is Ready
sequence_is_ready.tooltip: True if the next subaction in the sequence is ready to be executed, otherwise False.

sequence_time_to_ready.label: Sequence Time To Ready
sequence_time_to_ready.tooltip: Returns the amount of time remaining until the next subaction in the sequence will be ready.

totem_remaining_time.label: Totem Remaining Time
totem_remaining_time.tooltip: Returns the amount of time remaining until the totem will expire.

shaman_fire_elemental_duration.label: Fire Elemental Total Duration
shaman_fire_elemental_duration.tooltip: Returns the total duration of Fire Elemental Totem

cat_excess_energy.label: Excess Energy
cat_excess_energy.tooltip: Returns the amount of excess energy available, after subtracting energy that will be needed to maintain DoTs.

cat_new_savage_roar_duration.label: New Savage Roar Duration
cat_new_savage_roar_duration.tooltip: Returns duration of savage roar based on current combo points

warlock_hand_of_guldan_in_flight.label: Hand of Guldan in Flight
warlock_hand_of_guldan_in_flight.tooltip: Returns True if the impact of Hand of Guldan currenty is in flight.

warlock_haunt_in_flight.label: [DEPRECATED] Haunt In Flight
warlock_haunt_in_flight.tooltip: Returns True if Haunt currently is in flight.

affliction_current_snapshot.label: Existing Raw Snapshot %
affliction_current_snapshot.tooltip: How much stronger your existing snapshot is relative to baseline. Ignores Haste and Crit. Not recommended to use unless you know what you're doing.

affliction_exhale_window.label: Exhale Window
affliction_exhale_window.tooltip: Configured leeway for exhaling inhaled DoTs.

mage_current_combustion_dot_estimate.label: Combustion Dot Value
mage_current_combustion_dot_estimate.tooltip: Returns the current estimated size of your Combustion Dot.

protection_paladin_damage_taken_last_glo.label: Damage Taken Last Global
protection_paladin_damage_taken_last_glo.tooltip: Amount of damage taken in the last 1.5s.

aura_remaining_icd.label: Aura Remaining ICD
aura_remaining_icd.tooltip: Time remaining before this aura's internal cooldown will be ready, or 0 if the ICD is ready now.

aura_icd_is_ready.label: Aura ICD Is Ready
aura_icd_is_ready.tooltip: True if the aura's ICD is currently ready OR it was put on CD recently, within the player's reaction time (configured in Settings), otherwise False.

aura_icd_is_ready_with_reaction_time.label: [DEPRECATED] Aura ICD Is Ready (with Reaction Time)
aura_icd_is_ready_with_reaction_time.tooltip: All Aura checks now contain Reaction Time logic, so this is no longer needed. Use Aura ICD Is Ready instead.

overlap.label: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Maximum amount of time before the aura expires when it may be refreshed.

field_configs.min_icd_tooltip: If non-zero, filter out any procs that either lack an ICD or for which the ICD is smaller than the specified value (in seconds). This can be useful for certain snapshotting checks, since procs with low ICDs are often too weak to snapshot.
field_configs.include_reaction_time_tooltip: If checked, will use the configured reaction time.
field_configs.use_base_value_tooltip: If checked, will compare the current DoT to the the base value (on encounter start) of the DoT.

helpers.placeholder_tooltip: The Prepull Potion if CurrentTime < 0, or the Combat Potion if combat has started.

auto.description: Automatically using a Saved Rotation based on your current settings.

cooldowns.title: Cooldowns
cooldowns.tooltip:
Specify cooldown timings, in seconds. Cooldowns will be used as soon as possible after their specified timings. When not specified, cooldowns will be used when ready and it is sensible to do so.

Multiple timings can be provided by separating with commas. Any cooldown usages after the last provided timing will use the default logic.

alerts.choose_name: Choose a label for your saved rotation!

bear_weave.label: Enable bear-weaving
bear_weave.tooltip: Weave into Bear Form while pooling Energy

snek_weave.label: Use Albino Snake
snek_weave.tooltip: Reset swing timer at the end of bear-weaves using Albino Snake pet

use_ns.label: Use Nature's Swiftness
use_ns.tooltip: Use Nature's Swiftness to fill gaps in Predatory Swiftness uptime

manual_params.label: Manual Advanced Parameters
manual_params.tooltip: Manually specify advanced parameters, otherwise will use preset defaults

hotw_strategy.label: Heart of the Wild usage
hotw_strategy.tooltip: How to use Heart of the Wild

allow_aoe_berserk.label: Allow AoE Berserk
allow_aoe_berserk.tooltip: Allow Berserk usage in AoE rotation

roar_offset.label: Roar Offset
roar_offset.tooltip: Minimum offset gained between current Rip and new Roar to allow a Roar clip

rip_leeway.label: Rip Leeway
rip_leeway.tooltip: Minimum tolerated gap between current Rip and current Roar expiration times before kicking in emergency measures

bite_during_rotation.label: Bite during rotation
bite_during_rotation.tooltip: Use Bite during rotation rather than just for Rip maintenance during Execute

bite_time.label: Bite Time
bite_time.tooltip: Minimum seconds remaining before Rip or Roar should ideally be refreshed (including planned early clips) to allow a Bite

berserk_bite_time.label: Bite Time during Berserk
berserk_bite_time.tooltip: More aggressive threshold when Berserk is active

maintain_faerie_fire.label: Maintain Faerie Fire
maintain_faerie_fire.tooltip: Maintain Faerie Fire debuff. Overwrites any external Sunder effects specified in settings.

maintain_demo_roar.label: Maintain Demo Roar
maintain_demo_roar.tooltip: Keep Demoralizing Roar active on the primary target. If a stronger debuff is active, will not cast.

demo_roar_refresh_leeway.label: Demo Roar refresh leeway
demo_roar_refresh_leeway.tooltip: Refresh Demoralizing Roar when remaining duration is less than this value (in seconds). Larger values provide safety buffer against misses, but at the cost of lower DPS.

pulverize_refresh_leeway.label: Pulverize refresh leeway
pulverize_refresh_leeway.tooltip: Refresh Pulverize when remaining duration is less than this value (in seconds). Note that Mangle, Thrash, and Faerie Fire usage on cooldown takes priority over this rule, unless Lacerate itself is about to fall off.

apply_poisons_manually.label: Configure poisons manually
apply_poisons_manually.tooltip: Prevent automatic poison configuration that is based on equipped weapons.

honor_of_thieves_crit_rate.label: Honor of Thieves Crit Rate
honor_of_thieves_crit_rate.tooltip: Number of crits other group members generate within 100 seconds

thunderstorm_in_range.label: Thunderstorm In Range
thunderstorm_in_range.tooltip: When set to true, thunderstorm casts will cause damage.

exhale_window.label: Soul Swap Exhale Window
exhale_window.tooltip: How long, in milliseconds, before inhaled dots expire to exhale during multitarget encounters.

sting.label: Sting
sting.tooltip: Maintains the selected Sting on the primary target

trap_weave.label: Trap Weave
trap_weave.tooltip: Uses Explosive Trap at appropriate times. Note that selecting this will disable Black Arrow because they share a CD

multi_dot_serpent_sting.label: Multi-Dot Serpent Sting
multi_dot_serpent_sting.tooltip: Casts Serpent Sting on multiple targets

sting.label: Sting
sting.tooltip: Maintains the selected Sting on the primary target

trap_weave.label: Trap Weave
trap_weave.tooltip: Uses Explosive Trap at appropriate times. Note that selecting this will disable Black Arrow because they share a CD

multi_dot_serpent_sting.label: Multi-Dot Serpent Sting
multi_dot_serpent_sting.tooltip: Casts Serpent Sting on multiple targets

multi_dot_serpent_sting.label: Multi-Dot Serpent Sting
multi_dot_serpent_sting.tooltip: Casts Serpent Sting on multiple targets

details.no_results: Run a simulation to view results

timeline.disclaimer: Timeline data visualizes only 1 sim iteration.
timeline.note: Note: You can move the timeline by holding Shift while scrolling, or by clicking and dragging.

tooltips.player_damage_taken: Player Damage Taken / Raid Damage Taken
Player Damage Taken / Raid Damage Taken
tooltips.healing_avg_hit_tooltip: Healing / Hits and/or Healing / (Ticks + Critical Ticks)
tooltips.healing_hits_tooltip: Healing / (Hits + Crits + Glances + Blocks) and/or Healing / Ticks + Critical Ticks

json.title: JSON Import
json.description: Import settings from a JSON file, which can be created using the JSON Export feature.
json.instructions: To import, upload the file or paste the text below, then click, 'Import'.
json.error_invalid_json: Please use a valid JSON object.

wowhead.title: Wowhead Import
wowhead.feature_description: This feature imports gear, race, and (optionally) talents. It does NOT import buffs, debuffs, consumes, rotation, or custom stats.
wowhead.instructions: To import, paste the gear planner link below and click, 'Import'.

tinker_warning.title: Tinker issues
tinker_warning.message: There are known issues importing tinkers from Wowhead. Always make sure to double check your tinkers after importing.

wowhead.error_invalid_url: Invalid WCL URL {{url}}, must look like "https://www.wowhead.com/tbc/gear-planner/CLASS/RACE/XXXX"

addon.title: Addon Import
addon.feature_description: This feature imports gear, race, talents, and professions. It does NOT import buffs, debuffs, consumes, rotation, or custom stats.
addon.instructions: To import, paste the output from the addon below and click, 'Import'.

reforge_warning.title: Reforging issues
reforge_warning.message: There are known issues with Reforging when using the WSE addon. Always make sure to double check your reforges after importing.

link.title: Link Export
link.description: Export settings as a shareable link.
link.instructions: Copy the link below to share your settings with others.

json.title: JSON Export
json.description: Export settings as a JSON file.
json.instructions: Download the JSON file or copy the content below.

wowhead.title: WoWHead Export
wowhead.description: Export settings to WoWHead Gear Planner.
wowhead.instructions: Copy the link below to open your gear setup in WoWHead.

pawn_ep.title: Pawn EP Export
pawn_ep.description: Export EP weights for Pawn addon.
pawn_ep.instructions: Copy the Pawn string below and import it into your Pawn addon.

cli.title: CLI Export
cli.description: Export settings for command line simulation.
cli.instructions: Copy the command below to run simulations from the command line.

gear.label: Gear
gear.tooltip: Also includes bonus stats and weapon swaps.

rotation.label: Rotation
rotation.tooltip: Includes everything found in the Rotation tab.

external.label: Buffs & Debuffs
external.tooltip: All settings which are applied by other raid members.

miscellaneous.label: Misc
miscellaneous.tooltip: Spec-specific settings, front/back of target, distance from target, etc.

info.bug_report: Report a bug or Request a feature

status.unlaunched: This sim is a WORK IN PROGRESS. It is not fully developed and should not be used for general purposes.
status.alpha: This sim is in ALPHA. Bugs are expected; please let us know if you find one!
status.beta: This sim is in BETA. There may still be a few bugs; please let us know if you find one!

fixed_rng_seed.label: Fixed RNG Seed
fixed_rng_seed.tooltip: Seed value for the random number generator used during sims, or 0 to use different randomness each run. Use this to share exact sim results or for debugging.

language.label: Language
language.tooltip: Controls the language for Wowhead tooltips.

restore_defaults.tooltip: Restores all default settings (gear, consumes, buffs, talents, EP weights, etc). Saved settings are preserved.

warnings.profession_requirement: {{itemName}} requires {{professionName}}, but it is not selected.
warnings.too_many_jc_gems: Only 2 Jewelcrafting Gems are allowed, but {{count}} are equipped.
warnings.unspent_talent_points: Missing required talent selections in row {{rowNumbers}}.
warnings.armor_specialization: Equip {{armorType}} gear in each slot for the Armor Specialization (5% primary stat) effect.
warnings.dual_wield_2h_without_titans_grip: Dual wielding two-handed weapon(s) without Titan's Grip spec.
warnings.shaman_fele_autocast: Your Fire Elemental spell autocast setup is not optimal with the use of the Primal Elementalist talent (everything ON but Empower). If you know what you're doing, please ignore this.

modal.title: Calculate Stat Weights
modal.reference_description: The above stat selectors control which reference stat is used for EP normalisation for the different EP columns.
modal.current_ep_description: The 'Current EP' column displays the values currently used by the item pickers to sort items.
modal.copy_icon_description: Use the copy icon above the EPs to use newly calculated EPs.

dps_weight.label: DPS Weight
dps_weight.tooltip: Per-point increase in DPS (Damage Per Second) for each stat.

dps_ep.label: DPS EP
dps_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for DPS (Damage Per Second) for each stat.

hps_weight.label: HPS Weight
hps_weight.tooltip: Per-point increase in HPS (Healing Per Second) for each stat.

hps_ep.label: HPS EP
hps_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for HPS (Healing Per Second) for each stat.

tps_weight.label: TPS Weight
tps_weight.tooltip: Per-point increase in TPS (Threat Per Second) for each stat.

tps_ep.label: TPS EP
tps_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for TPS (Threat Per Second) for each stat.

dtps_weight.label: DTPS Weight
dtps_weight.tooltip: Per-point increase in DTPS (Damage Taken Per Second) for each stat.

dtps_ep.label: DTPS EP
dtps_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for DTPS (Damage Taken Per Second) for each stat.

tmi_weight.label: TMI Weight
tmi_weight.tooltip: Per-point decrease in TMI (Theck-Meloree Index) for each stat.

tmi_ep.label: TMI EP
tmi_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for TMI (Theck-Meloree Index) for each stat.

death_weight.label: Death Weight
death_weight.tooltip: Per-point decrease in p(death) for each stat.

death_ep.label: Death EP
death_ep.tooltip: EP (Equivalency Points) for p(death) for each stat.

current_ep.label: Current EP
current_ep.tooltip: Current EP Weights. Used to sort the gear selector menus.

suggest_reforges.title: Suggest Reforges
suggest_reforges.freeze_item_slots_tooltip: Flag one or more item slots to be "frozen", which will prevent the optimizer from changing the Reforge or gems in that slot from their current settings. This can be useful for hybrid classes who use the same gear piece for multiple raid roles.
suggest_reforges.stat_caps_tooltip: Stat caps are the maximum amount of a stat that can be gained from Reforging. If a stat exceeds its cap, the optimizer will attempt to reduce it to the cap value.
suggest_reforges.breakpoint_limit_tooltip: Allows you to set a custom breakpoint limit.
suggest_reforges.breakpoints_implemented: The following breakpoints have been implemented for this spec:
suggest_reforges.reforge_optimization_failed: Reforge optimization failed. Please try again, or report the issue if it persists.
suggest_reforges.enable_modification: This will enable modification of the default EP weights and setting custom stat caps.
suggest_reforges.modify_in_editor: Ep weights can be modified in the Stat Weights editor.
suggest_reforges.hard_cap_info: If you want to hard cap a stat make sure to put the EP for that stat higher.
suggest_reforges.include_eotbp_socket_tooltip: Allows the optimiser to also include the "Eye of the Black Prince" socket in the optimization.
suggest_reforges.limit_execution_time_tooltip: If checked, the solver will error out if the total computation time exceeds 30 seconds. If unchecked, then total computation time will be capped at 1 hour instead.

tooltip.title: Theck-Meloree Index (TMI)
tooltip.description: A measure of incoming damage smoothness which combines the benefits of avoidance with effective health.
tooltip.note: Lower is better. This represents the % of your HP to expect in a 6-second burst window based on the encounter settings.

tooltip.title: Chance of Death
tooltip.description: The percentage of iterations in which the player died, based on incoming damage from the enemies and incoming healing (see the Incoming HPS and Healing Cadence options).
tooltip.note: DTPS alone is not a good measure of tankiness because it is not affected by health and ignores damage spikes. Chance of Death attempts to capture overall tankiness.
